description: Blip is a retro-themed oscilloscope robot and a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its soldier-like box body and hand-down arms and legs, it stands out in any digital battlefield. Its screen displays a classic game of Snake, providing endless entertainment during downtime. Equipped with stylish glasses, Blip has an eye for detail and accuracy. Its ability scores are as follows: hp: 7, charisma: 4, constitution: 6, dexterity: 8, intelligence: 9, strength: 5, wisdom: 6. Blip has honed its skills in analyzing waveforms and manipulating electrical signals. Although an inanimate object, Blip has a neutral alignment, always striving for efficiency and precision.
name: Blip
